EmailTemplate.description: Case Acknowledgement for Transactional Error Quoting
EmailTemplate.name: Case Acknowledgement for Transactional Error Quoting
EmailTemplate.subject: Request for Quote {!Case.CaseNumber},
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Request for Quote Information Only – No Action required
Dear Customer,
We have received your request for quote. We will provide a notification once the quote is updated in Honeywell Aerospace Portal.
Thank you for the opportunity to provide a quote for this request.
Visit MyAerospace to take advantage of 24x7 Price and Availability, Quote Status, Order Placement and Order Status.
Note
This email is being sent from unmonitored mailbox. If you need further assistance, please contact a customer support team member at:
1-800-601-3099 For US / Canada (Toll Free) 1-602-365-3099 International
Thank You, Honeywell Aerospace Customer Support Team
CONTACT US
© 2020 Honeywell International Inc.
